title: Technology-Integrated Mathematics Education Design: TPACK and 21CLD Framework-Based Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and proficiency in fundamental smartphone usage
context.additional_context: In-depth mathematical concept learning and project execution using smartphones in a limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners can understand the TPACK framework and select appropriate technological tools for math content to apply in lesson design
Learners perform technology-integrated math activities reflecting 21CLD core elements (collaboration, critical thinking, creative problem-solving, etc.) with over 80% participation
Learners complete three or more math projects using smartphone-based digital tools (gamification apps, educational software, etc.) and meet evaluation criteria

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
